#include <stdio.h>
int tw[4]={2,4,8,6},th[4]={3,9,7,1},fo[2]={4,6},se[4]={7,9,3,1},ei[4]={8,4,2,6},ni[2]={9,1};
int main()
{
int t;
scanf("%d", &t);
while(t--)
{
int m,r;
long long int b, a;
scanf("%lld%lld", &a, &b);
if(b==0)printf("1");
else
{
if(a%10==0||a%10==1||a%10==5||a%10==6)printf("%d", a%10);
else if(a%10==2)
{
m=4;
r=b%m;
if(r==0)r=m;
printf("%d", tw[r-1]);
}
else if(a%10==3)
{
m=4;
r=b%m;
if(r==0)
r=m;
printf("%d", th[r-1]);
}
else if(a%10==4)
{
m=2;
r=b%m;
if(r==0)
r=m;
printf("%d", fo[r-1]);
}
else if(a%10==7)
{
m=4;
r=b%m;
if(r==0)
r=m;
printf("%d", se[r-1]);
}
else if(a%10==8)
{
m=4;
r=b%m;
if(r==0)
r=m;
printf("%d", ei[r-1]);
}
else if(a%10==9)
{
m=2;
r=b%m;
if(r==0)
r=m;
printf("%d", ni[r-1]);
}
}
printf("\n");
}
return 0;
}
